node.title: Beliive
node.excerpt: World's largest time bank, empowering people to recognize abundance by living new experiences one hour at a time.

node.excerpt: Joint Idea is a synergy platform that cultivates consciousness, creativity, and serendipity by connecting ideas, people, place, and time.

node.title: Ubuntu Tribe
node.excerpt: Ubuntu Tribe is an ecosystem of digital investment and business management tools aiming at boosting financial inclusion.

node.title: 3Bot Connect renamed to ThreeFold Connect
node.excerpt: As mentioned as a preview in our October update, 3Bot Connect is now more accurately named ThreeFold Connect across devices.

node.title: ThreeFold is Attending the AIBC Summit in Dubai
node.excerpt: Our co-founder Kristof will be giving a keynote and some of our team will be at the expo hall!

node.title: Update on the Binance Smart Chain Integration
node.excerpt: We are happy to update that the BSC integration is going just as planned and next week, TFT will be available there.

node.title: What's Possible on Grid 2

node.title: Happy Holidays!
node.excerpt: Let’s take a moment to acknowledge what a year it’s been for all of us around the world.

node.title: Liquid Receives $120 Million in Debt Financing From FTX
node.excerpt: The owner and operator of top tier exchange FTX finances Liquid and enters discussions around further collaboration.

node.title: Liquid Hacked, TFT Not Affected
node.excerpt: Liquid, an exchange on which TFT is listed, has been hacked. It appears TFT was not affected.

node.title: Sharing the November 2020 AMA recording

node.title: The November 2020 community call recording
node.excerpt: For those who missed yesterday's community call (~30 minutes) or would like to rewatch, you can find the recording within!

node.title: Announcing the November 2020 community call
node.excerpt: Mark your calendars! Next Monday November 2nd at 5pm CET we will host a 30-minute community call to update you on exciting progress and to show you what we’ll be working towards in the coming months.

node.title: ThreeFold's October 2020 community update is here
node.excerpt: It’s the end of October and a lot has gone on this month – an upgrade to testnet, progress on ThreeFold Now, some notable new team members, and more! Find the link to the full update within!

node.title: A First Look at Terraform on TF Grid 3.0
node.excerpt: A demo on how easy it is to create, use, and destroy deployments on TF Grid 3.0 using Terraform.

node.title: ThreeFold on Corporate Unplugged Podcast
node.excerpt: ThreeFold co-founder Kristof de Spiegeleer appeared on the Corporate Unplugged podcast, with previous guests Simon Sinek and Seth Godin.

node.excerpt: Momentum is an online event of 49 hours with more than 2,000 participants and 105 teams working on 21 complex 21st-century problems.

node.title: ThreeFold participating @ Global Reset!

node.title: ThreeFold Q1 Highlights

node.title: ThreeFold & WaykiChain collaborate to decentralize cloud computing

node.title: A Journey Into ThreeFold
node.excerpt: A conversation with Scott and Sam about Scott's journey into ThreeFold, the tech, the people, and more.

node.title: Into the Fold – The ThreeFold Movement
node.excerpt: It's not by mistake that you're here, reading this post. You can feel that a global shift is happening. And you want to do something about it.
